trans-unit.source: The attribute table is a read-only collection of metadata attributes that are associated with specific types, members, and dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 屬性表格是中繼資料屬性的唯讀集合，這些屬性與特定的型別、成員和相依性關聯。

trans-unit.source: This table is created using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> and is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore>.
trans-unit.target: 此表格是使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> 建立，而且由 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore> 使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> is created using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> and is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> 是使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> 建立，而且由 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore> 使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all types that have attribute overrides, on a property, member, or the type itself.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有型別的列舉，這些型別在屬性、成員或是型別本身都具有屬性覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to determine what types will be refreshed when this attribute table is added to the metadata store.
trans-unit.target: 這可以用來決定此屬性表格加入至中繼資料存放區時將重新整理的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type to check for metadata.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查中繼資料的型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this table contains metadata for the given type.
trans-unit.target: 判斷此表格是否包含給定型別的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the table contains metadata for the type at the class level or metadata associated with a <see langword="DependencyProperty" /> or <see langword="MemberDescriptor" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料表包含類別層級之型別的中繼資料，或包含與 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="DependencyProperty" /> 關聯的中繼資料，則為 <see langword="MemberDescriptor" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the given arguments.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供給給定引數之所有屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This method never returns a null enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法絕不會傳回 null 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The type to get class-level attributes for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其類別層級屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all class-level attributes provided for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供給指定之型別所有類別層級屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 符合準則之屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This will never return a null enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這絕不會傳回 null 列舉。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type that contains the member.
trans-unit.target: 包含成員的型別。

trans-unit.source: A member descriptor to get custom attributes for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得自訂屬性的成員描述項。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified member of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供給所指定型別之所指定成員的所有屬性列舉。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 符合準則之屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This will never return a null enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這絕不會傳回 null 列舉。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> or <paramref name="descriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> 或 <paramref name="descriptor" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type that contains the member.
trans-unit.target: 包含成員的型別。

trans-unit.source: The member to provide attributes for.
trans-unit.target: 要提供其屬性的成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified member of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供給所指定型別之所指定成員的所有屬性列舉。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 符合準則之屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This will never return a null enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這絕不會傳回 null 列舉。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> or <paramref name="member" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> 或 <paramref name="member" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The owner type of the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性的擁有者型別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to provide attributes for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其提供屬性之成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified member of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供給所指定型別之所指定成員的所有屬性列舉。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 符合準則之屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This will never return a null enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這絕不會傳回 null 列舉。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> or <paramref name="memberName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> 或 <paramref name="memberName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The owner type of the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性的擁有者型別。

trans-unit.source: A dependency property to get custom attributes for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其自訂屬性 (Attribute) 的相依性屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified dependency of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供給所指定型別之所指定相依性的所有屬性列舉。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 符合準則之屬性的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This will never return a null enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這絕不會傳回 null 列舉。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> or <paramref name="dp" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> 或 <paramref name="dp" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
